芞字的基本解释

芞
qì
古书上说的一种香草。亦称“揭车”。

芞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qì］
［《集韻》欺訖切，入迄，溪。］
见“芞輿”。

芞字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芞； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1019第16
【唐韻】去訖切【集韻】欺訖切，?音乞。香草也。【說文】芞，輿也。【爾雅·釋草】藒車芞輿。【疏】一名藒車，一名芞輿。　又【廣韻】許乞切，音肸。【類篇】其迄切，音扢。義?同。?、䒗，同。

芞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
芞字的起名意思

古书上说的一种香草。亦称“揭车”。

芞
Basic explanation of words
芞
qì
A kind of vanilla mentioned in ancient books. Also known as "revealing the car".
芞
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qì］
["Jiyun" deceives and cuts, enters, stream. ]
See "Fang Yu".
芞
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　芞; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1019-16
[Tang Yun] Go and cut [Jiyun] Cheating and begging. Vanilla too. 【Said Wen】Feng, Yu Ye. 【Erya·Shucao】Liao Che Xiangyu. [Shu] One is Lei Che, and the other is Mi Yu.　[Guangyun] Xu Qiqie, the sound is palpitated. 【Classes】It has been cut so far, and the sound is broken. Righteous? Same. ?, 䒗, the same.
